snippet: OKRENT--Shirley. Congregation Or Zarua mourns the death of our member, Shirley Okrent. May He who consoles the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem bring comfort to her family. Scott N. Bolton, Rabbi; Marc D. Ashley, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: OKRENT--Shirley. Congregation Or Zarua mourns the death of our member, Shirley Okrent. May He who consoles the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem bring comfort to her family. Scott N. Bolton, Rabbi; Marc D. Ashley, President 1/3
